Summon Commander:#2089 Jigami
The Shugenja contacts and strikes a bargain with a Jigami, a kami of the farms and fields. They protect villages and farms in rural areas and have powers over fertility and growth. They are not powerful enough to influence entire provinces, but their presence yield food and supplies in the area.
